titleStmt.title: The fayre mayde of the Exchange with the pleasant humours of the cripple of Fanchurch. Very delectable, and full of mirth.
titleStmt.author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Valentine Simmes] for Henry Rockit, and are to be solde at the shop in the Poultrey vnder the Dyall,

notesStmt.note: First word of title is xylographic.
Running title reads: The faire maide of the Exchange.
Reproduction of the original in the the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the shop in the Poultrey vnder the Dyall
